video.title: Saint Hildegard von Bingen - Selected Verses for Meditation - Christian Mystics
video.description:
Hildegard of Bingen (1098 – 1179), also known as Saint Hildegard, was a German Benedictine abbess, writer, composer, philosopher, Christian mystic, visionary, and polymath. She is one of the best-known composers of sacred monophony, as well as the most-recorded in modern history.  She has been considered by many in Europe to be the founder of scientific natural history in Germany.
